text: Idayan is a 2010 Indian Malayalam historical film, directed by Santosh Sauparnika, starring John Mathew and Rajeev Rangan in the lead roles and Joy Purayidathil in a supporting role.http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/8009/malayalam/edayan/index.htm ==Cast== * John Mathew * Rajeev Rangan * Santosh Souparnika * Joy Purayidathil * Sidhraj ==References== Category:2010 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Malayalam-language films
title: Idayan
